product_name: NYX Professional MakeupSlim Eye Pencil Long-Lasting Eyeliner
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackThe best-selling NYX Professional Makeup Slim Eye Pencil is a creamy long lasting eyeliner that applies smoothly in a variety of eye-popping longwear shades!
details: DetailsBenefitsCreamy eyeliner pencil that applies smoothly and is easy to blendThis long lasting eyeliner does not tug, pull, smear, bleed or clumpAvailable in many highly pigmented shades including your classic black eyeliner, eye opening white eyeliner and vibrant sapphire blue eyelinerSharpen this eye pencil with any regular pencil sharpenerCruelty freeKey IngredientsContains Coconut Oils to hydrate and conditionItem 2139536How To UseLine upper and lower lash line as desired. Use with any NYX Professional Makeup eyeshadow, mascara or lashes.IngredientsBlack: Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Talc, Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Beeswax / Cera Alba / Cire d'abeille, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire de Carnauba, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Euphorbia Cerifera Cera / Cire de Candelilla, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Line upper and lower lash line as desired. Use with any NYX Professional Makeup eyeshadow, mascara or lashes.
ingredients: Black: Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline
Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire de Carnauba

reviews.headline: NYX Eye Pencil
reviews.comments: I like the pencil but when try and sharpen it the tip breaks off and you are basically left with no pencil. And that's using the NYX sharpener.

reviews.headline: Great eye pencil
reviews.comments: Was looking for an eye pencil not a pen and found this one. Will go back to get another color.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I use this for my brows. It's the perfect color, and it goes on smoothly

reviews.headline: Love of my life!
reviews.comments:
Sharing a trade secret! Try using this as a lip liner üòá
It's the perfect brown lip liner if you're looking for one

reviews.headline: Smears
reviews.comments: SMEARS so bad - better off using an eyeshadow or liquid‚Ä¶ or just a different product

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: They have changed the formula which irritates my eyes badly. Some things should not be changed and this product is one that should have been left alone.

reviews.headline: So happy to find this at Ulta!!
reviews.comments: My favorite eyeliner is no longer and I was so happy to find this as it is better than my favorite.Goes on so smoothly, stays on and blends easily with a brush. NYX does NO animals testing which is a must for me. I  highly recommend this.

reviews.headline: I would this again and again
reviews.comments: Everything  was very nice I recommend  NYX products

reviews.headline: New Formula Is Horrible
reviews.comments: The new formula causes an eye irritation that seems as if a 15 pound baby is sitting on your eyelids.

reviews.headline: Love the colors, but..
reviews.comments: I have a hard time finding the right green. When I saw this I was thrilled, but I could not find it in water proof. So I bought it and it wouldn't stay the same strong green color even tho I baked under my eye.

reviews.headline: Love this pencil
reviews.comments: I love the color and the price is just right.

reviews.headline: Nice pencil
reviews.comments: Loved the color and the texture was not hard.

reviews.headline: Smooth glide
reviews.comments: I use this on my waterline, it's perfect for that application

reviews.headline: Aweful
reviews.comments: Couldn't sharpen. Tip would break off everything i tried to sharpen.  Tip was hard and dry

reviews.headline: 9 out of 10
reviews.comments: It's a creamy easy to use eyeliner, I just wish it wouldn't smudge throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I've used this pencil for years and even grew up watching my mother use this pencil. It was my favorite one for my eyebrows. Although the color and application is still great, getting it to an actual point is the issue. It breaks every time I go to sharpen it. I keep purchasing the pencil in hopes that I'll find one that won't keep crumbling. But I'm very disappointed and saddened that the formula has obviously changed.

reviews.headline: Wonderful
reviews.comments: So so easy to use and really creamy only thing is that it goes super fast

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This is the only pencil eyeliner I use. Goes on easy ,long lasting !

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: I love the color but for me personally it's hard to put it on my waterline. My eyes are probably just too wet lol. The formula and creaminess is nice. It IS hard to sharpen though, and the point does break off sometimes. But it's a good product

reviews.headline: No pigment & crumbly!
reviews.comments: Don't waste your time, this is a really useless product.

Great dark non smudge and long lasting

faceoff_positive.comments: NYX pencil lip liners are my absolute favourite. affordable yet so smooth, pigmented, and very long-lasting! also love supporting a cruelty-free brand. i see in previous reviews that there's a lot of confusion/disappointment regarding how one should sharpen them. the slide on lip pencils are not retractable, but rather have a plastic casing as opposed to the conventional wooden lip pencil. i heard NYX sells a sharpener specifically made for this purpose but i personally use the wet 'n' wild dual pencil sharpener and it works just fine (: hope this helps! NYX lip pencils will forever be my go-to!
faceoff_positive.headline: most favourite lip liners!!

faceoff_negative.comments: These were a hit or miss for me. Out of the four that I purchased two were excellent and two were horrible. I got Taupe to use for my brows and it is the perfect match, blends like a dream and makes it super easy to fill in sparse areas. Yellow has great color payoff. However the Sky Glitter and Silver Glitter are just plain awful. The points break off immediately upon contact, even with the barest touch. I also found them difficult to sharpen. I'm willing to try many of the other colors though I'll hesitate before trying another of the glittery ones.
faceoff_negative.headline: These were a hit or...
